item.title: Silver beech on West Drive at an angle, 27th January
item.description:

item.title: Car collision causing damage., 27th January
item.description:
On the gate of our property number 53a, on December the 7th two car crashed into the lamppost sign on the round about. This then fell and damaged our gate and fence. Highways came out that day and cut down the lamppost as has been pulled out of the concrete and was falling into our property. This has been reported, however no one has come to carry out the works as and canâ€™t see anything active on fix my street. We have now repaired the damage to our property however the lamppost has electrical live wires with a danger bag over it. We live right by an infants school and this needs to be made priority to be fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Meadow Way, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Complete bollard is damaged (Non illuminating bollard or post)
